task.title: Turning images to GIF using gifmaker.me
task.shortdesc: There are many other methods of creating an animated GIF aside from Photoshop. Using gifmaker.me is an easy and free way of converting images into animated GIF format. You can also reformat your images by cropping, resizing, and optimizing.

prereq.p: You will need images you want to convert to GIF format.

step.cmd: Make any according changes in the control panel.
step.info: You can change animation speed, canvas size, and how many times the GIF can repeat itself.

taskbody.result: After conversion is complete, you will be able to view the GIF, download it, or continue to format your newly created GIF.
